title: Quantum Gates
description: Learn about quantum gates and quantum circuit construction.

items.title: Single-Qubit Gates
items.description: Master the fundamental single-qubit gates: Pauli gates, Hadamard, and rotation gates.

concepts.title: Pauli Gates (X, Y, Z)
concepts.description: Learn the three Pauli gates and their geometric interpretations on the Bloch sphere.
concepts.mathematical_foundation: X = σₓ, Y = σᵧ, Z = σz (Pauli matrices)

concepts.title: Hadamard Gate
concepts.description: Understand how the Hadamard gate creates superposition states from computational basis states.

concepts.title: Phase Gates (S, T)
concepts.description: Explore phase gates that add relative phases without changing probability amplitudes.
concepts.mathematical_foundation: S = diag(1, i), T = diag(1, e^(iπ/4))

concepts.title: Rotation Gates
concepts.description: Master arbitrary single-qubit rotations around different axes of the Bloch sphere.

items.title: Multi-Qubit Gates
items.description: Understand CNOT, Toffoli, and other multi-qubit gates that enable quantum computation.

concepts.title: CNOT Gate
concepts.description: The controlled-NOT gate is fundamental for creating entanglement and quantum logic.

concepts.title: Controlled Gates
concepts.description: Learn how to construct controlled versions of any single-qubit gate.

concepts.title: Toffoli Gate
concepts.description: Explore the three-qubit Toffoli gate and its role in reversible computation.

concepts.title: Fredkin Gate
concepts.description: Understand the controlled-SWAP gate and its applications in quantum algorithms.
